Actions.Name: Complete System Task
Actions.Description: Completes the specified system activity (automatic work item).

Actions.Name: Complete Human Task
Actions.Description: Completes the specified human task (manual work item), and changes its status to Completed in the database.

Actions.Name: Start Process Instance
Actions.Description: Creates a process instance for a specified process instance ID and parameters.

Actions.Name: Get Data
Actions.Description: Retrieves a process attribute (custom attribute) with the specified process attribute ID and process attribute name.

Actions.Name: Get Process Instance
Actions.Description: Retrieves information about a specified process instance.

Actions.Name: Get User
Actions.Description: Retrieves the profile information for the specified registered user.

Actions.Name: Generate New Guid
Actions.Description: Retrieves the UUID generated by AgilePoint Server.

Actions.Name: Get Process Models
Actions.Description: Retrieves all versions of all process models (process definitions).

Actions.Name: Save Data
Actions.Description: Sets a list of process attribute (custom attributes) to the specified values for a specified custom attribute ID.

Actions.Name: When a process instance is started
Actions.Description: Trigger When AgilePoint Process Instance Started.

Actions.Name: When a trigger flow process activity is executed
